name: Bumpkin's Spooky Adventure
description:
Ludum Dare 45:

This project was our attempt at completing a game in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 45 game jam. 

The Game:

Bumpkin's Spooky Adventure is a 2D side scrolling action game that subtly implements the concept of "starting with nothing", as the player's character, Bumpkin, starts his battle with no weapons. However, when Bumpkin dies, the Almighty Plumpkins resurrect his soul and offers him the chance to enhance his abilities in order to fight off the incoming hordes of Spooky Bois.

Credits:

Graphics: Dylan Lambert

Programming: Elijah Madsen

Music and Sound: Elijah Madsen
